climbs.name: Defecation Orifice
climbs.fa: Don Langford, Chuck Graf, Frank Hill, Dave Hedgcock, Bob Weiss, 1973

content.description: Great rock and fun route with cracks and pockets.  Gobbles up nuts and cams from top to bottom.  Lots of potential to climb variations on/from this route.
content.location: The route begins on the right side of the wall.  Find an orifice or two and enjoy.

content.description: No crowds, little sun, and potential for adventure.  Little is known or at least shared about this impressive area and perhaps that is for the best.  Unique features and micro-climates make this another gem among the Superstition Mountains.  Only two routes are listed in the guidebook and the descriptions are so vague they are almost useless.  Keep this area wild, climb gently and quietly so as not to raise the dead...
